mapper.select: SELECT info_id, user_id, category_id, title, content, image_url, created_at, updated_at, view_count, is_deleted FROM info WHERE is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT info_id, user_id, category_id, title, content, image_url, created_at, updated_at, view_count, is_deleted FROM info WHERE info_id = #{infoId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO info (info_id, user_id, category_id, title, content, image_url, created_at, updated_at, view_count, is_deleted) VALUES (#{infoId}, #{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{viewCount}, #{isDeleted})
